title: Ranger Cards
content:
Cards that make up your Ranger deck. On your turn, you can spend an amount of energy matching the card’s cost to play that card. The card then has an effect based on its card type. Alternatively, when performing a test, Ranger cards can be discarded to contribute their approach icons to the effort.

There are six types of Ranger cards:

  • Role
  • Moments
  • Attachments
  • Gear
  • Features and beings
  • Attributes
